suggest.ext-amqp: Allows some operations to use a message queue system.
suggest.ext-pnctl: Process control management for command-line applications.
suggest.ext-redis: Allow connecting applications to a Redis data store.
suggest.ext-uploadprogress: Allows showing upload progress for SiteFileEntry widgets.
suggest.psr/log: Enables logging using the PSR logging interface.
suggest.silverorange/botr_api: Enables video processing using the Bits On The Run API.
suggest.silverorange/nate_go_search: Article search indexing and CME search index framework.
suggest.silverorange/net_notifier: Enables async notifications from web applications using web sockets.
